title: Career Exploration in Biological Sciences
description: The goal of this course is to expose students to careers available with a biology degree. The course will focus on diverse career topics such as research, sustainability, medicine and healthcare, product management, business development, science communication, sales, entrepreneurship, and legal professions. Students will engage with industry professionals in these areas through panel discussions and will read and discuss articles on these career pathways. Note: This course is a distance education course.
